class.name: InputEventMouseButton
class.brief_description: Input event type for mouse button events.
class.description: Contains mouse click informations. See [method Node._input].

members.member: Mouse button identifier, one of the BUTTON_* or BUTTON_WHEEL_* constants in [@GlobalScope].
If [code]true[/code] the mouse button's state is a double-click. If [code]false[/code] the mouse button's state is released.
